text: O vi kred ne violate rites institut DI nor Sankt Monat nor best ofert nor garlands mark them nor popol kap por Sankt Shrine (Ka bah) streb blessings el their Lord approval Once vi komplet pilgrimage vi cxas. Ne provoked aggression your hatred popol who once prevent vi el ir Sankt Masjid! Vi cooperate materi de righteousness piety; ne cooperate materi est sinful evil Vi observ DI. DI est strict en enforcing retribution
